b'InuYasha: Kuroi Tessaiga': b"A 30-minute Inuyasha feature titled Kuroi Tessaiga screened on Takahashi Rumiko's picture exhibitions across Japan.\n\nIn January 2010, this special ended up, slightly edited, as episode 15 of Inuyasha Kanketsu-hen."
